plot: Two old friends own a valuable piece of football history. Down on their luck, one wants to sell it - the other one says they'll sell that over his dead body. This is their story.
title: The Pigskin
plot_es: Two old friends own a valuable piece of football history. Down on their luck, one wants to sell it - the other one says they'll sell that over his dead body. This is their story.
plot_en: Two old friends own a valuable piece of football history. Down on their luck, one wants to sell it - the other one says they'll sell that over his dead body. This is their story.
